item.title: ‘Green hydrogen consumption to be escalated from 2040’, says Atul Jairaj, Deloitte
item.description: Deloitte's report at ETAuto Tech Summit 2024 calls for a transition from ICE to non-ICE vehicles like CNG, LPG, biofuel, green hydrogen, and EVs to reduce import bills and achieve sustainability. FY 2023-24 saw 232.5 million metric tonnes of crude oil imports. The report targets carbon neutrality by 2070 and greenhouse gas reductions by 2045, addressing vehicle afterlife sustainability.

item.title: iPhone 16 Pro could finally add something Android users have been enjoying for years
MSI Cyborg 14: A light, cheap gaming laptop with Steam Deck-like battery life
item.description: The MSI Cyborg 14 is the lightest gaming laptop I've ever tested. Plus, it's performance is good enough to handle triple-A games.

item.title: Go full secret agent with mini night-vision digital binoculars for 43% off

item.title: Top 6 robot vacuum and mop combos to look for on Prime Day
item.description: The best robot vacuum mop combos do more than drag a soggy cloth around. We tested these hybrids from Roborock, Shark, and more.
